entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
